title: UTLA statement on spike in violence in L.A. (UTLA - United Teachers Los Angeles)
text: ( Source : UTLA - United Teachers Los Angeles ) From the street shooting of a 16-year-old football player to the recent lockdown at Maya Angelou Community High , the surge in violent crime in Los Angeles is impacting our students. As educators,
